## Data source
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
data1 <- read.csv("data/The Hollywood Inider - all data - 2007.csv")
data2 <- read.csv("data/The Hollywood Inider - all data - 2008.csv")
data3 <- read.csv("data/The Hollywood Inider - all data - 2009.csv")
data4 <- read.csv("data/The Hollywood Inider - all data - 2010.csv")
data5 <- read.csv("data/The Hollywood Inider - all data - 2011.csv")
data6 <- read.csv("data/The Hollywood Inider - all data - 2012.csv")
data7 <- read.csv("data/The Hollywood Inider - all data - 2013.csv")
data8 <- read.csv("data/The Hollywood Inider - all data - 2014.csv")
data9 <- read.csv("data/The Hollywood Inider - all data - 2015.csv")
data10 <- read.csv("data/The Hollywood Inider - all data - 2016.csv")
data11 <- read.csv("data/The Hollywood Inider - all data - 2017.csv")
data12 <- read.csv("data/The Hollywood Inider - all data - 2018.csv")
data13 <- read.csv("data/The Hollywood Inider - all data - 2019.csv")
data14 <- read.csv("data/The Hollywood Inider - all data - 2020.csv")
data15 <- read.csv("data/The Hollywood Inider - all data - 2021.csv")
data16 <- read.csv("data/The Hollywood Inider - all data - 2022.csv")

movie_data <- rbind(data5, data6, data7, data8, data9, data10, data11, data12).  #2011-2018
write.csv(movie_data, "movie_data.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
